short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society Shop and Give Button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS) Shop & Give Button is a Chrome browser extension that notifies users when they visit an online merchant who will donate a portion of every purchase to LLS. 

The user may also visit the LLS Shop & Give site at http://lls.shoppinganddonation.com to find additional online stores that participate in this LLS donation program.
